app.name: GCMM
app.long_description:
A memory card manager for Wii/GC.
Libogc compatibility update by PabloACZ Batch gci backup by Pikachu025 Banner and Icon support by dronesplitter F-Zero and Phantasy Star Online support by Ralf Folder and sorting support by dragonbane0
Thanks to original mcbackup example code, Askot, dsbomb and justb. Special thanks to Costis, Masken, Tantric, tueidj, DacoTaco, Extrems. Beta testing: f3bandit
